channel.title: Pi/Dspk [Help] Combat mode wrong ! Help!
channel.description:
How to i change my Combat sidebarinterface ???

I want it to be like this [img]http://img703.imageshack.us/img703/3518/unled2hyo.png[/img]
I know , i need to go to itemassitant . but than i search for what thing , Case 4151 or something ????
